title: Drake celebrates son Adonis’ second birthday with rare glimpse at family life
text:
Drake is celebrating son Adonis’ birthday in style (Pictures: Instagram, Rex)

Drake has shared a sweet message to celebrate son Adonis’ second birthday.

The God’s Plan rapper is notoriously private about his family life, not speaking publicly about the little one until last year.

But he has thrown all that out of the window to commemorate the toddler’s big day.

And, taking to Instagram, the 32-year-old gave his 60.9million followers a look into how they were celebrating.

Alongside a photo which showed Adonis spelled out in gold balloons, he wrote: ‘Happy Birthday King.’

And, right on cue, fans and famous faces rushed to offer the little one their good wishes.

DJ Khaled commented: ‘Happy bday young [king].’

While Carnage screamed: ‘HAPPPPPPY BIRTHDAY NEPHEW,’ and Skepta posted: ‘Long live,’ with two heart emojis.

And a follower added: ‘Happy Birthday to the little legend.’

Advertisement

While Adonis’ mum, Sophie Brussaux, shared a sweet throwback of the little one on her own Instagram page.

Drizzy is yet to share a photo of Adonis with fans, but has previously us a glimpse into his artwork like a proud dad.

He confirmed he welcomed his son with Sophie Brussaux last year in true Drake style, in songs on his double album, Scorpio.

As you do…

He could be heard rapping: ‘She’s not my lover like Billie Jean but the kid is mine. Sandi [Drake’s mum] used to tell me all it takes it one time, and all it took was one time. S**t, we only met two times, two times.

‘I used to challenge my parents on every album. Now I’m embarrassed to tell them I ended up as a co-parent.

Drake confirmed Adonis’ birth on his Scorpio album (Picture: PA)

‘Always promised the family unit. I wanted it to be different because I’ve been through it.’

In the track Emotionless on Scorpion, he insisted that he wasn’t keeping Adonis a secret, but more the other way around.

‘I wasn’t hiding my kid from the world. I was hiding the world from my kid,’ he rapped.

‘Breakin’ news in my life I don’t run to the blogs. The only ones I wanna tell are the ones I can call.’

Well now it looks like Drizzy has changed his tune…
